long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Got too many tabs in your Chrome? Your tabs got lost in the long list of bookmarks?

Use taaab to help you organize your tabs! Simple, clean, and elegant. You can immediately begin to use it without any sign up, login, etc!

~ Highlights ~

- Know what's behind a link just by a glimpse.
- No messy windows, customize your window name, so you can organize them better. 
- Save 40% of your time by organizing your tabs with taaab!

~ Stay in touch ~

We appreciate your suggestions and requests. If you experience a bug or any features you would like to add in taaab. Please send us an e-mail at :taaabextension@gmail.com. We will be happy to correct any bugs.
